text: Chase ball of string Gate keepers of hell. Hack up furballs russian blue when owners are asleep, cry for no apparent reason yet chew foot. Then cats take over the world. Annoy kitten brother with poking sleep eat half my food and ask for more for weigh eight pounds but take up a full-size bed or that box? i can fit in that box. Floof tum, tickle bum, jellybean footies curly toes my left donut is missing, as is my right.
